parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To resist, strive against, contend. From anti and agonizomai; to struggle against.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To resist, supersede, replace, oppose. From anti and kathistemi; to set down against, i.e. Withstand.
As far as, until, even to.
Blood, literally, figuratively or specially; by implication, bloodshed, also kindred.
